ModMetaData.name: RimEconmy
ModMetaData.author: TW
ModMetaData.description: RimEconmy RimEconmy is a rimworld mod that trying to add many econmy related feature to the game. speciality natural resource Every world tile has a chance to have a speciality when generated. Increasing animals, plants, resource rocks. production AI base will produce extra goods based on what and how many specialities they have near by. This mod support DeepRim mod. Please load this mod after DeepRim. The mod Set-up Camp doesn't support this mod. Set-up Camp mod doesn't allow to set up camp on any tile that has a world object, and speciality is world object. So you can't set up camp. It's pitty, but I can't solve that problem by my self. I have posted on Nandonalt's forum thread, We have to wait for some while though. Requires HugsLib.\n version 1.0.0
